page.title: 03CHURCH FENTON A CHILD'S VIEW
page.content: Fifty children at Church Fenton Primary school were interviewed to discover their thoughts about school and the village.We found out: 1.50% of children walk to school,20% go by bus,20% by car 10% by bike. 2.95% travel to school in less than 15 mins. 3.Popular hobbies include watching T.V.,computer games walking and playing in the park. 4.Most liked living in C.F. as it is a friendly place. 5.Most said they wanted more shops especially toy and clothes shops. 6.Dislikes include lack of facilities and shops.(Adults said same). Worst of all the noise from the RAF planes. 7.Most would probably leave village due to noise,lack of facilities and to find a job.
